StringTable.Label: TechnologyOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: We cooperating together all civilizations will be able to finish their current research project

StringTable.Label: TechnologyOutreach_Question
StringTable.String: Should everyone get their current research project completed?

StringTable.Label: ANewHomeWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: The Xendar's homeworld was destroyed many years ago. Since then, they have sought a new world. At last, we have found a suitable planet for them to settle on. Should they be given a homeworld?

StringTable.Label: ANewHomeWorld_Question
StringTable.String: Should the Xendar be given a planet?

StringTable.Label: ThuliumNeeded_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a definite shortage of Thulium in the galaxy. This proposal requires us to use all our resources to convert 5 dead worlds into Thulium.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumNeeded_Question
StringTable.String: Should 5 dead worlds be converted to Thulium?
